snippet: A spokesman for Jon S. Corzine, New Jersey’s governor from 2006 to 2010, did not reveal details regarding the location and the cause of death for Jeffrey Corzine, 31.
abstract: Jeffrey Corzine, youngest child of former New Jersey Gov Jon S Corzine, has died at age 31; cause of death is not immediately known.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for Jon S. Corzine, New Jersey’s governor from 2006 to 2010, did not reveal details regarding the location and the cause of death for Jeffrey Corzine, 31.
